attributes.comment: Fundamental types used by many commands and structures
These types are part of the API, though not directly used in API commands or data structures

attributes.comment: Will add VkDeviceCreateFlagBits when bits are defined in the future
Sparse resource memory management API commands

Promoted from VK_KHR_relaxed_block_layout, which has no API
Promoted from VK_KHR_storage_buffer_storage_class, which has no API
Originally based on VK_KHR_subgroup (extension 94), but the actual enum block used was, incorrectly, that of extension 95

children.text: offset 1 reserved for the old VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BIND_BUFFER_MEMORY_INFO_KHX enum
offset 2 reserved for the old VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BIND_IMAGE_MEMORY_INFO_KHX enum

attributes.name: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPLIT_INSTANCE_BIND_REGIONS_BIT
attributes.comment: Allows using VkBindImageMemoryDeviceGroupInfo::pSplitInstanceBindRegions when binding memory to the image

attributes.name: VK_MEMORY_HEAP_MULTI_INSTANCE_BIT
attributes.comment: If set, heap allocations allocate multiple instances by default

attributes.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT
attributes.comment: Format can be used as the source image of image transfer commands

attributes.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT
attributes.comment: Format can be used as the destination image of image transfer commands

attributes.name: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_2D_ARRAY_COMPATIBLE_BIT
attributes.comment: The 3D image can be viewed as a 2D or 2D array image

children.text: Additional dependent types / tokens extending enumerants, not explicitly mentioned

attributes.comment: Originally based on VK_KHR_protected_memory (extension 146), which was never published; thus the mystifying large value= numbers below. These are not aliased since they were not actually promoted from an extension.

attributes.name: VK_DEVICE_QUEUE_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT
attributes.comment: Queue is a protected-capable device queue

attributes.name: VkDeviceQueueCreateFlagBits
attributes.comment: This is a temporary workaround for processors not recognizing that VK_DEVICE_QUEUE_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT above also requires this type

attributes.name: VK_COMMAND_POOL_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT
attributes.comment: Command buffers allocated from pool are protected command buffers

attributes.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_MIDPOINT_CHROMA_SAMPLES_BIT
attributes.comment: Format can have midpoint rather than cosited chroma samples

attributes.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_YCBCR_CONVERSION_LINEAR_FILTER_BIT
attributes.comment: Format can be used with linear filtering whilst color conversion is enabled

attributes.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_YCBCR_CONVERSION_SEPARATE_RECONSTRUCTION_FILTER_BIT
attributes.comment: Format can have different chroma, min and mag filters

attributes.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COSITED_CHROMA_SAMPLES_BIT
attributes.comment: Format can have cosited rather than midpoint chroma samples

children.text: Additional dependent types / tokens extending enumerants, not explicitly mentioned

attributes.comment: Promoted from VK_KHR_shader_draw_parameters, with a feature support query added

attributes.name: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRROR_CLAMP_TO_EDGE
attributes.comment: No need to add an extnumber attribute, since this uses a core enum value
Promoted from VK_EXT_shader_viewport_index_layer, which has no API (extension 163)

attributes.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_MINMAX_BIT
attributes.comment: Format can be used with min/max reduction filtering

attributes.name: VkPrivateDataSlotCreateFlags
attributes.comment: Will add VkPrivateDataSlotCreateFlagBits when bits are defined in the future
Promoted from VK_EXT_ycbcr_2plane_444_formats (does not promote the Feature struct, just the formats) (extension 331)
Promoted from VK_EXT_4444_formats (does not promote the Feature struct, just the formats) (extension 341)
Promoted from VK_EXT_texture_compression_astc_hdr (Feature struct is promoted, but becomes optional) (extension 67)
Promoted from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state (Feature struct is not promoted) (extension 268)
Promoted from VK_EXT_extended_dynamic_state2 (Feature struct and optional state are not promoted) (extension 378)
